website_summaries.verdict: These sandals are a go-to pair for people with wide or swollen feet.
pros: Can be worn all day, every day, with both casual and dressy outfits
Comfortable for people with wide or swollen feet
Two adjustable hook-and-loop closures, one buckle
Comes in black grain, blue, bone, dusty taupe nubuck, teak and white grain
cons: Buckle closure rules these out as slip-on shoes
Not as much arch support as expected

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WEAR WELL
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly Mother. First i thought they were perfect. She has worn them just a couple of months and the velcro is totally shot! VERY DISAPPOINTED to say the least. I would recommend them to no one. At the price paid they should last a long time. She is hardly ever on her feet and usually wears the same shoes for many seasons. Her last pair was worn for three years and the velcro was just like new. THESE ARE TERRIBLE QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: C Shop

customer_reviews.title: Ortho sandals needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered. I was so afraid that I wouldn’t be able to wear sandals this summer after nursing a plantar plate tear since August. In and out of boots, the only shoe I have been wearing are orthopedic tennis shoes with an orthotic. I ordered these and they do have good structure to them for wear part of the day - and the price was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: chestertownchic

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a pair of these sandals that lasted over 10 years...and I wore them a lot! I was happy to find them again! I received them within a few days and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kepling

customer_reviews.title: Butt Ugly and Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I bought these two years ago, last year they became my go-to shoe. I badly sprained my ankle 20 months ago and broke the tip of my fibula. I couldn't wear heels of any height. These shoes were high enough to match the boot I was in so I wasn't walking crooked. They are sturdy and extremely comfortable. I wouldn't wear them hiking, but they are great on most surfaces. They are long wearing and my favorite shoe now. I'm ordering another pair, to hold onto since by the time this pair wears out they might no longer be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Clark

customer_reviews.title: 5th pair of Propet
customer_reviews.text: 5th pair of Propet brand shoes -- All but one a tad too small for my 7M feet with bunions. This shoe is VERY slippery inside, with or without socks. I have fallen 5 times in 4 years from either tripping on something or shoes/feet slipping out from under me. The shoes are very challenging to wear. Comfort is good, just slippery. At age 68, I won't be wearing theses very often.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas Kat

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE SANDALS!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the most stylish sandals...BUT I LOVE THEM!!! SO comfy, sturdy, stable. I have narrow boney feet, and many shoes just don’t fit regardless of reported width. These are great...the Velcro straps make them adjustable to YOUR FEET! The buckle used to be a real buckle, but the new Velcro closure is fine and actually easier to use. I have bought at least FIVE pairs over the years. They last and last, and are so comfy. If possible please make them with a slightly higher heel for my plantar fasciitis...please! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Joycie

customer_reviews.title: Fit well & are adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact shoe that I bought several years ago. I have worn these for a couple of months now. I wore the old sandals summer after summer and literally wore them out. I was happy to see them available on Amazon and anxious to get them. They do fit well like the old pair, but the quality has gone way down. We will see how long they last, but the leather appears to be much thinner now and just does not look as good as it used to. Alas, I think that is the way with most things these days.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and the xwide can accommodate large swollen feet
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit me perfect, but I have very swollen feet so if your feet are not swollen or really big, then these would be loose on you. The straps are adjustable though so you could make them tighter or looser. Whichever you choose. I paid a really good price for these also. Quite a bargain. Quick shipping too. They are okay looking also.
customer_reviews.author: Bren from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit around ankle properly
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it didn't fit properly around my ankle. It was disappointing, as would have been comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: White Breeze Walker Sandal, size 9m - Not so breezy
customer_reviews.text: Terrific price in my size but disappointing in the wearing - absolutely zero support of any sort, felt like walking on slightly padded mini surf boards. Amazingly, I kinda liked the way they looked on my feet, less “orthopedic shoe “ than expected. Also liked that the straps across the top of foot were adjustable. Be aware the buckle on top strap is fake, just a cover for a velcro closure. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Wide is very wide!
customer_reviews.text: These Propet Breeze Walkers were purchased in wide which I take, but I think they are wide in style so would have been better off with the medium width next time. I just use the velcro straps to adjust for width, but the support would have been better in nedium, I also had trouble with the part under the ball of the foot on both feet. The inside is actually getting roughed up and you can feel the shredded insole as you walk--not comfy at all. I would stick with the black or white because there is a vinyl footbed and I also have had no trouble with the brown having gone through several pair.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY NOT TRUE TO SIZE I WEAR A 9 MEDIUM I ORDERED A 9 1/2 WIDE AND MY HEEL HANGS OFF THE BACK AND THE SIDES OF MY FOOT HAND OFF THE SIDES. VERY DISAPPOINTED REALLY LIKED THE SHOES BUT CAN'T WEAR A SHOE THAT YOUR FOOT HANGS OFF OF IT. WOULD HAVE BEEN VERY COMFORTABLE AND LOTS OF SUPPORT AND CUSHION BUT SIZING IS WAY OFF
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: My Mother-In-Law likes them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Mother-in-law and she really likes them. She is no longer in a nursing home, and no longer walks, so I can't say how comfortable they are to walk in. But she loves the look of them and that they are easy to put on and take off. She also loves that they a genuine leather. She wouldn't wear anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Momof6

customer_reviews.title: Same style as the pair I ordered in Bone, ...
customer_reviews.text: Same style as the pair I ordered in Bone, and same size, but this pair is narrower and shorter, and the top strap is velcro, with a fake buckle. Doubt I'll be wearing them that often, so keeping them, but I'll think twice before ordering Propet again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and go with everything
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sandal that would allow for some swelling in my feet as the day wore on. These are adjustable and very versatile. They go with everything. The downside is the lack of arch support. I wouldn’t take a long walk in these if you have a high arch. But fir an everyday, casual sandal, these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Usually love their shoes
customer_reviews.text: Usually love their shoes, but something has changed with their lines. Think maybe they moved to China with so many other companies, but their products are not the same and I won't buy them any more. Read lots of disappointments in reviews. These are hard and the soles are NOT COMFORTABLE TO WALK ON. Worn only a few times and always happy to take them off. Sad, making them cheaper but lost customers. Maybe comfort and reputation and better quality control would have kept customers.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Grip closures convenient
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a white leather sandal at a reasonable pricing. This one was exactly what I was looking for to add variety to my wardrobe. Will save them for warm weather for church or an evening out. Like the convenience of the grip closures. The buckle was added for decoration but is also a grip closure
customer_reviews.author: populistbird

customer_reviews.title: Quality but not for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my elderly mother in a wheelchair. I'd have returned them even if they had fit. I felt the Velcro attachments would make it easy for her to put them on but the buckle was hard to undo, and she'd never have been able to fasten them, I thought they had a fake buckle with Velcro also.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly M.

customer_reviews.title: The heel strap is not a  real buckle but a velcroe and can not be adjusted to a small heel.
customer_reviews.text: Propet is my favorite brand of shoe and very well made. They usually fit me perfectly. This sandel is lovely with a nice paded sole. i hated to send them back but the heel strap did not close tight enough to prvent it slipping when I tried to walk. The strap has a buckle for show and is really velcro just like the other two staps. I have a wide foot with a narrow heel and this just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Boni

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if all the left sandals are like this, so I'm returning it and will try ...
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing one of my more worn Propet breezewalker sandals. I have purchased several of them over the years. In addition to a narrower width printed inside (so they felt a little narrow, but I could still put them on) , the left rear strap on the left shoe hit the middle of my ankle. It rubbed against it hard enough during the few minutes I wore it that I decided wearing a band-aid with it might not do the trick. I don't know if all the left sandals are like this, so I'm returning it and will try to find a more comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Propet customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years as there are too few manufacturers producing sandals for the narrow foot. Unfortunately I gave it lower than 5 stars because one foot has a strange and crooked closing when I make the straps tighter. The right foot is fine but the left seems to have been cut incorrectly and it gaps on the velcro closing. I wrote to the marketing department but they never bothered to respond to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sandals
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 93 year old mom. They are well made. Had to return them because they were described as having three adjustable Velcro straps when they actually they have two Velcro straps and one buckle. Since her stroke she can not do buckles. I thought that the third Velcro strap was at the heel of the sandal. It is a solid strap.It is a good sandal though. The nubuck uppers are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is not very Wide looks like plastic and the velcro on the straps is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to return this item. Is not very Wide looks like plastic and the velcro on the straps is very weak. Purchased for my mom who has diabetes and needs wide shoes. Not happy. If anyone has suggestions where to buy xxxtra wide shoes size 12 womens. Please let me know. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: radio killer

customer_reviews.title: Owned a pair for 20 years....
customer_reviews.text: was afraid to buy new in case they were totally different. They are the same sandal I loved - EXCEPT - the buckle is now Velcro. And since I am twenty years older they are much easier to put on. Thank you to the Manufacturer!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SpudMop

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom, who has a wide feet and is a difficult person to find comfortable shoes. She told me as soon as she received them she put them on and left them until she went to bed. She said they were so comfortable she didn't realize she had them on. My mom's feet someone's get swollen and because all the straps are adjustable she doesn't have to worry about her sandals not fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They are very comfortable and so easy to slide on and with the velcro closures are easy to close. The only thing I do not like is that the inner foot lining is white and will show the dirt very easily. I think they can be hand washed if necessary. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: km in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sandal wears well, but you cannot tighten the straps without the shoe looking lopsided. Also, the heal is well made but could use a larger arch. The price was a little high for a shoe of this caliber, only the upper is leather and it is thin and will eventually frat.
customer_reviews.author: MS. CYNTHIA J. CARTER

customer_reviews.title: A sandal I can count on
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this sandal many times over the years because they fit, they wear well, they're comfortable. This newest sandal I love even better than the original. The strap now attaches with Velcro instead of a buckle. So easy to adjust during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: good everyday sandals
customer_reviews.text: The fit on these sandals is excellent for me. I have a very high arch and many shoes cannot accommodate it - but these can. Comfortable enough for all day wear. Just wish there were more color choices - I'd get 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Christianne Melanson

customer_reviews.title: I am hoping this will get better as I break in the shoe after wearing the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have three other pairs of Propet Sandals that fit perfectly. I ordered these in the same size, and the back strap on the right shoe rubs higher up on the bone and is uncomfortable after wearing them for even a short time. I am hoping this will get better as I break in the shoe after wearing the sandals more often. For me, the Propet sandals are quite expensive, and I am disappointed in the way they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Ross

customer_reviews.title: What I got was just a dirty pair of shoes with what it seems a nail ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my grandmother who is 87 years old. What I got was just a dirty pair of shoes with what it seems a nail coming out of one shoe. This is very upsetting!!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Montero

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 xx wide
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 9.5 xx wide. Longer in the toe than expected. Was happier at initial purchase because shoes unexpectedly Velcroed, but as I walked in them the leather proved to be more malleable than anticipated. Still happy for 15$ purchase, would get a 9 xx wide next time. I have a shorter wide foot, wanted to see if xx wide fit versus xxx wide. Xx wide in this model is a decent wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: They feel great when I walk; that's saying something given that I have deteriorated knees (one already replaced and the other will be done soon.) Also have degenerative disc disease; had hip replacement last January.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Deming

customer_reviews.title: Too short and less wide!  Why?
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals, but this last pair I just ordered and received seem a lot shorter and less wide then all my others. They were made in China as opposed to my others. Propet, why are you messing with your reputation in such a way that according to many comments that I have read recently, is costing you customers. Boots and these sandals will be returned soon and I'll have to find another company to accommodate my swollen feet. What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I own many pairs of these sandals. I went on a 10-day cruise where I had excursions at every port. I am a very large lady with VERY wide feet. I ended up wearing these the entire trip! The most comfy sandals I’ve ever owned. So glad they come in super wide widths AND they’re cute.
customer_reviews.author: Likes2MakeCards

customer_reviews.title: Style, Fit and Color, a great combination in this sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Was originally concerned that the sandal would be too wide but found it fit perfectly and even provides great arch support. Having the velcro straps helps so that I can adjust as needed to allow for foot swelling. Have bought a second pair in a different color and know they will fit perfectly as well. Thank you. Would definitely buy the product again and will monitor for additional colors as they become available.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Roady

customer_reviews.title: Propét Women's Breeze Walker Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Am so glad I bought these, easy to get on, ordered one size larger so glad I did fit perfectly. Highly recommend these if tiring and bukleing is diffi to do, extremely light weight and oh so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Van De Loo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I returned these because they would not adjust as narrow as some of the other products Propet sells. Some straps were not velcro adjustable; hence, the reason for me returning the sandals. I love Propet but this style did not work for me (even though I did purchase the narrow).
customer_reviews.author: MS gal

customer_reviews.title: The Fit...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a similar style Propet Sandal in 7.5 W, Style W0028, but a different color. These sandals have always been her favorite for the fit and the comfort! However, this Current Order is almost half inch smaller in ‘Width’ than her previous sandals. Please tell me what happened? Miguelito.
customer_reviews.author: miguelito

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, I have only worn them once an they hurt my toes on the left foot. Have to adjust the straps. They are very cushiony and once I get used to them, they will fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gail Harder

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe but not everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and had them shipped to Korea to serve as my slip on shoes. (Koreans change their shoes at work.) The reviews said they were comfortable, but I didn't find their comfort that great. I couldn't wear them all day. However, when I returned to the States, these were awesome. I'm not sure what the difference is, but I think flooring materials may be a factor in their comfort. In Korea, marble is common and.. the surfaces are just different. Carpeting of any sort is rare. Anyway, I gave it three stars for that reason, but I think most people in the States will find these very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What has changed?
customer_reviews.text: I have owned previous Breeze Walkers and have worn them to death. They are the most comfortable sandals around. However, with my 2 last pairs, I have gotten blisters where the top strap hits the inside top of my foot. They look exactly the same as my old pairs, but there must be some difference with the lining fabric of the strap to cause this problem. Don't know what it is - I just let the cuts heel, then tighten the strap to see if it helps. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: daydream

customer_reviews.title: False advertising on width
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom who has wide feet. Wasn't sure which would fit her best so ordered the 2E initially because she has had luck with 2E shoes in the past. The shoes that arrived looked like normal width shoes. So I then ordered the 4E shoes. To my surprise, the 4E and the 2E were exactly the same shoes, even though they were labeled 4E and 2E. Stay away from these if you need wide shoes.
customer_reviews.author: fredx - san francisco

customer_reviews.title: Yea Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot & it is very difficult to find sandals that fits my feet. I got these in black & they not only came in a narrow width but you can adjust the straps across the foot to customize the fit. They are comfortable; highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Southern  grandmother

customer_reviews.title: If you use your feet you will like these
customer_reviews.text: I walk about 3 miles every other day in the summer, part of it steeply uphill. I have preferred Propet sandals for this, and keep at least two pair available. Like all sandals, they are no good at keeping out dirt and stones - but these are washable! I wash one pair and hang them on my clothesline in the sun to dry while wearing another pair. The first two pair I had lasted four years this way. They do not last as long now, as I have learned to wear them with wool socks in the winter, just loosening the straps a little.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma V

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable. I would like the looks of them better ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I would like the looks of them better if they had a buckle instead of the Velcro. However it does make them very adjustable. I have hammer toes and they fit comfortably over them. They also have good arch support. I still need a little more support if I am going to be on my feet for most of the day. I haven't found a sandal that will give me the support I need for that. I like the look of the material and so far has been no problem keeping them clean. These are about as good as I can get for my bad feet in an open shoe.
customer_reviews.author: lady of the woods

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Breeze Walker sandal -- Have several pairs. I teach a self-contained 1st through 5th grade Life Skills class and am on my feet all day -- and often running after kids. I'm also in my 60's so comfortable shoes are a must have. These fill the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Little Shine

customer_reviews.title: A little Larger Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 other pairs of these same sandals in other colors. They are all 4A and run a little wide. The white pair I just ordered through Amazon are the same size but could be a half size smaller. Also, all the other ones I had before had a strap with a real buckle which I like better than the velcro one on my sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Marie Dill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 82 year old mother. She has blood clots so her feet are swollen and has alzjeimers. These are perfect for her and she seems to.like them. So thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: tickers50

customer_reviews.title: Velcro straps
customer_reviews.text: The photograph shows a buckle, but it's fake, just for show. All the straps are secured with velcro, even the one with the buckle, which I think is not as secure as a real strap. Eventually the velcro will probably give. So I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joaninha

customer_reviews.title: Sandle
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, wide fit well, short for size. Back strap was cut shorter than the shoe back. Kept shoe and will take it to shoemaker to lengthen strap. Next time will order next larger size or buy Clark’s Sandler and pay a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Barbi See

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the summer
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit properly...I attempted to return them but there box w/shoes is wrapped and waiting for pickup!!! Driver said it was not on his list to pick up...I want to return them ASAP. Please let me know when I can send them back. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sandals
customer_reviews.text: With this purchase I now have three pair of these shoes in various colors. Love the fit and how comfortable they are to wear. These are true walking comfort sandals. Perfect for vacations and around home.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaBell

customer_reviews.title: Looking for comfort?  Get Propet.
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 or 8 pairs of Propet shoes and I have never been disappointed. They are very comfortable and long wearing. As someone who has a problem with shoes hurting my feet, it is wonderful knowing when I purchase Propets that they will not hurt. I only wish they made a style that was dressier. I will continue buying and wearing this brand.
customer_reviews.author: mega reader

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE QUALITY SANDAL!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Super comfy like slippers! Well made and classy for me a 60 year old woman. I especially love the velcro hidden under the buckle strap. Really cool and so easy for me instead of trying to bend down and buckle the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Lash

customer_reviews.title: As I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the pair I owned was so worn out. The new pair fits the same as the old pair. Great purchase and price, for great fitting shoes for my big feet!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lum

customer_reviews.title: BET SHOE FIT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE A VERY BAD BACK/THIS BRAND OF SHOES IS THE ONLY SHOE I CAN WEAR/DOCTOR VERY PLEASED I FOUND A SHOE THAT FIT PROPERLY AND WELL MADE/I WOULD BUY THEM NO MATTER THE COST/I CAN WALK NOW WITH OUT MY BACK HURTING/HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO AT LEAST TRY THEM
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Propet Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect in every way. I was a little apprehensive about the size because of reviews that said they didn't fit as stated for the size ordered. They were wrong. The fit is perfect. The quality is just as advertised. They are so comfortable I can even take long walks in them. I had a tear in the Miniscus in my knee, and I'm wearing these shoes with no pain. They are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn, and I would recommend them to everyone. I'm planning to buy another pair in a different color in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: BettyLou

customer_reviews.title: I have a pair of Easy Spirit sandals that I love but are wearing out
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Easy Spirit sandals that I love but are wearing out. I looked all over for a pair like them, but could not find anything close. I found these Propet sandals online. They have the style and color I wanted. They cost a little more, so I was hesitant to buy them. But it was well worth the price. I have bunions and foot pain and swelling, and these sandals were very comfortable on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Originally the price was at $72 but when it went down to $51, I knew I had to buy it immediately. We had purchased this as a birthday gift for my mom. Received our order in a few days, the box and packaging were in great condition, I inspected the sandals all around and it was definitely brand new. My mom loves it. I was really worried about the width, but it was perfect. Purchased two more in a different color at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: DaveCynS

customer_reviews.title: Love Propet Breezewalkers!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and use a NIKKEN MAGNETIC INSOLE pasted inside. Too much arch support is painful for me. I have only worn this particular shoe for most days for the past eight years. A pair lasts about a year and the heal wears. Can be fixed at shoe repair, but they are cheap enough to just buy new ones. If your feet swell and shrink the straps are velcro and adjustable with ease. Have them in a number of colors. PROPET is a great company. This AMAZON Store was phenomenal, both with price and fast shipping! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarx2

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe find Right size
customer_reviews.text: I have an seven year old Propet sandal that fit perfectly same size that I ordered But somehow this pair didn't fit right. Right where the shoe bikers is too high and rubs my ankle . Been Diabetic I can't use this cute pair. I'll be sending it back. Hope the other two will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Ochoa-Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals--as soon as I put my feet in them, I knew we were in love, lol! The fit is perfect and they are so comfortable to wear. I'm ordering another pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and great support
customer_reviews.text: it's makes me feel like I have great support and it won't come off. Wish arch was better supported but i may have a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom. She has issues with her feet and these are one of the few shoes that do t hurt her feet. The one surprise was that it has velcro under the buckel so this was easier for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and width
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable and white. They have adjustable straps and as I need a wide width these these are ideal and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: SOFT & COMFY
customer_reviews.text: I have gone overboard ordering every color in the Propet Breeze Walker collection. They are so soft and so comfy. I got a Sole Wear Guarantee for 1,000 miles with my last pair! I would be disappointed if Propet were to ever change the style of this wonderful sandal. Looks nice with crop pants, jeans & shorts. If I wore skirts, they would look nice with a skirt. I highly recommend this sandal if you are looking for a shoe that is as soft to walk in as this one is. Order & enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Butler

customer_reviews.title: Propet Breeze Walker Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are too wide for me. I had hoped the 3 straps could make them narrow enough to fit my long thin feet, but no, the velcro is too short to pull them tight. Why can't shoe companies make a narrow shoe to fit people like me. Narrow styles aren't even available! This seems strange to me, my feet were narrower when I was younger, but I could still find shoes to fit, but no more! I cannot be the only woman who would like a narrow sandal! They are well-enough made, and the texture of the leather is quite pleasant, but I regret that I am unhappy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kahne Questor

customer_reviews.title: Dusty Taupe is a gorgeous neutral!
customer_reviews.text: The color is just beautiful and doesn't stand out like white. I purchased these for my daughter, and we both noticed the sizing is just slightly big (by about 1/2 size). If they were available in a 4.5, I would have exchanged them; yet, 5 was the smallest, and my daughter was unwilling to give them up. They still look adorable on her feet, but most importantly, she loves how comfortable these are (even with being slightly roomy). I want a pair of these now. Since I am a 6M, I will order myself a 5.5M in these.
customer_reviews.author: Moo!!!

customer_reviews.title: Comfort wins every time.
customer_reviews.text: Not an elegant sandal but smart enough to wear anywhere. Hunted around town for a white wide fitting sandal came up with the choice of zero, so tried Amazon and found these a little more than I wanted to pay but having had this brand before I know they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jet

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: SHOES ARE EXACTLY WHAT I EXPECTED (SOFT, COMFORTABLE AND FIT PERFECTLY). LOVE THE FEEL AND WOULD RECOMMEND THIS SHOE FOR THE HARD TO FIT FOOT.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: I love the style and construction of this sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and construction of this sandal. Unfortunately although I always wear a 9.5 in propet, this one was so short that my toes hang over the front and my heel edges over the back so I was unable to wear them long enough to make any statement about comfort. I did like the shoe well enough to exchange it for a size 10 and am hoping that my expectations based on this too small pair are realized in one that will not be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like that these sandals can be adjusted from tow to ankle, and I have problems qith both on both feet. They are very comfortable as long as I keep the annoying Florida sand (everywhere/inland) out from inside the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Christine F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe for Uneven Swelling in Feet
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect for someone that needs adjustable shoes due to more swelling in one foot. Great shoes and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R DeMars

customer_reviews.title: Adjust easily to width and hold the foot well and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Adjust easily to width and hold the foot well and have enough cushioning in the sole. The buckle is a little hard to handle and the leather could be more delicate, not so rough.
customer_reviews.author: Losik

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don't have feet issues
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for about 3-4 hours and I was disappointed that they don't feel as comfortable as I had hoped. I also purchased two more pair in alternate colors. Unfortunately buying them in the winter months and not wearing them until March, it's too late to return them. I have problem feet, so it may be more my feet than the shoes. I think I will stick to buying shoes in person in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The style is nice but these run a little small. Disappointed because the leather straps are kind of stiff and left marks on my feet which turned into blisters. Donated to Salvation Army after one wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these shoes! They fit my wide feet just perfectly. They look and feel great, and the price is incredible. They are well cushioned. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Pattillo

customer_reviews.title: My third pair
customer_reviews.text: I like these sandals because they can go with casual or dressier clothing. This is my third pair of these due to how comfortable I find them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic, so I need shoes that can be flexible with width sizing. Ordered size 12, but it was more of a size 10 at the most. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hodges-Wehmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not enought support at instep
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the fit around the buckle are and back strap are so loose. I wear 8.5 Narrow and the buckle did not go tight enough and since there is no adjustment on the back strap my foot felt like it was swimming with no support.
customer_reviews.author: nanabell

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the sandals. Brought them on vacation and had to walk forever. These were so comfortable and looked nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy and hot for the summer
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 EE shoe and have plantar fasciitis. These shoes seem to fit as expected and are relatively comfortable. I have trouble wearing them all day because they tend to get a little hot and the straps bother me after a few hours. I usually wear Birkenstocks, but wanted something that could look a little dressier while still comfortable enough for my foot pain. Pros: Sturdy and well constructed, available in widths Cons: Straps irritate my feet sometimes, not very fashionable
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: An absolutely wonderful wonderful shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a very narrow foot, and this is the ONLY sandal I've EVER found that fits me. It is just wonderful; it has good arch support so I can wear them all day long and have no foot fatigue. And they wear forever. I have been wearing my favorite ones, dark blue, for three years and no wear is evident. I took them to my podiatrist thinking he might want to suggest them to people having foot troubles. He was very impressed with them. I have three pairs, in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well, and are comfortable. The small disappointment I have with the shoes is that they look like they are made of plastic. It says they are leather, and they may well be but they look and feel like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H

customer_reviews.title: Propet Sandals Are Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Every pair of Propet sandals I've purchased fit like a glove. They are light weight and feel good on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Propet Black Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at the SAS sandals and this one popped up so I assumed it was SAS being sold by Propet. I have several pairs of SAS sandals and was sure of the fit. Since this was not an SAS sandal I was a little disappointed and the fit could be a little bit better - also the construction of the shoe. But I cannot complain about the price and plan to wear the shoe, maybe with socks to start so I will not get any blisters. If they break in and are comfortable I will be sure to buy more of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My mother has feet problems and definitely she loves these shoes. Thanks for this great product
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered because of my swollen arthritis feel. Fit ok, but the velcro seems to catch and stick to my pants. I still wear them. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but poor arch support.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made sandals, however, the arch support is poor, something that disappointed me with a company so well known as Propet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Propet Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said: "If it fits and you like it, buy it in every color" must have meant me. I have such a wide foot, so I love this shoe because it comes wide-enough for me. Why or why, tho, can't shoe makers understand that even if you have wide feet, it would be nice to be able to enjoy a BIGGER VARIETY OF COLORS! So, offer this shoe to me in more colors, please. The only complaint I have is I wish the connecting strap were also velcro. I started buying this shoe because my old favorite shoe called "Valley Lane" stopped being manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Cimfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very comfortable. They aren’t too long, so they aren’t a trip hazard, which is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: katjenks

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These have been comfortable from the get go. I love that there are 3 adjustable straps so you can get the perfect fit. The price was a super good deal too. I really trust the Propet brand and appreciate that they carry narrow widths.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Item not as stated in ad
customer_reviews.text: Velcro straps are excellent for adjusting these shoes EXCEPT they failed to make the back strap in velcro as well and it makes the putting on and taking off of the shoes difficult. The ad states there are 3 velcro adjustable closures when in fact there are only 2. I returned item.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Love trying on fit perfect. I'll update when I wear or and about
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable footbed
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sandal. Glad to find in white. Cushiony footbed. First comfy ones i've found in many years. Easier on arthritic feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with this show. Very comfortable. I have 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Pattybear

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! I have a lot of heel pain and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I have a lot of heel pain and find I can only wear most sandals for a few hours at a time. Also my feet tend to swell during the hot summer days making most shoes painfully tight by the end of the day. I was able to walk comfortably while wearing these all day on vacation during hot, humid weather! They're not going to win any fashion contests, but I'm old enough to prefer function over appearance!
customer_reviews.author: ATM_mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this sandal since 2012. The item I received last week was not at all the same quality as the product I have been buying previously. The straps were too short and the leather looks cheap and fake.
customer_reviews.author: NGB

customer_reviews.title: My Feet Smile
customer_reviews.text: My poor, miserable, painful feet sure appreciate these shoes. I've bought many, many pairs of shoes but I should send them to the Goodwill because these new Propet make my feet smile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Propét Women's Breeze Walker Sandal
product_meta.description:
Propet Breeze Walker Sandals for women. From narrow to extra, extra wide... you're sure to find your size! Enjoy the warm summer breeze in these comfortable Breeze Walker Sandals: Lined supple leather uppers; Air-cell polyurethane outsole for comfort and durability; Built-in arch support; Contoured footbed leather wrapped insole; 3 adjustable straps for a custom fit; Each approx. 14 ozs. State Color, Width and Size. Walk away with this great deal today! Please Note: This item is shipped directly from the factory. Please allow an extra 1-2 weeks for delivery... sorry no express shipping available. We are unable to ship factory direct items to Canada, Puerto Rico or APO or FPO addresses. AVAILABLE SEPARATELY: Women's Propet Nubuck Breeze Walkers, Dusty Taupe - word search in our Store for 'Propet'. Women's Propet Breeze Walkers, Black, White or Pink

Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?
feature_bullets: Supple full grain or nubuck leather upper
